title: Quality Systems Management
description: Quality assurance as viewed from a systems perspective that includes cost, time, and process elements. Lean thinking applied as a problem solving approach to achieve continuous process improvement through the elimination of waste and the reduction of variability. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: IT 341 or IT 371 and STAT 217, or STAT 218, or STAT 251; Business majors must have formally declared their concentration to enroll
